item.title: Gluttony of great open ML tools too hard for enterprise to use
item.description: Seems like every week we hear about yet another new open source Machine/Deep Learning library or Analytical Framework. Talking to people at Strata this week only confirmed for me that in the midst of what can only be described as virtual gluttony of open-source software, there is massive number of organizations who find it increasingly harder to implement these technologies.
